reporter_caption.center: DANZER v. THE DEPT. OF LABOR AND INDUSTRIES, 103 Wn. App. 1041 (2000)

caption.center: EDWARD L. DANZER, Appellant, v. THE DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AND INDUSTRIES,

court.center: The Court of Appeals of Washington, Division Two.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeal from a judgment of the Superior Court for Thurston County, No. 98-2-00095-1, Wm. Thomas McPhee, J., entered April 30, 1999.

opinion_text.unpublished: Affirmed in part and remanded by unpublished opinion per Seinfeld, J., concurred in by Houghton, J., and Williams, J. Pro Tem.
